Title: Marighella
Writer: Felipe Braga, Wagner Moura, Mário Magalhães (based on the book by)
Actors: Ana Paula Bouzas, Bella Camero, Herson Capri, Humberto Carrão
Plot: Facing a violent military dictatorship and an intimidated opposition, writer-turned-politician Carlos Marighella articulates a resistance all the while ousting heinous crimes of torture and the infamous censorship instituted by the regime.
